comments: Grimes (NYK) and Strus (MIA) mutually engage and disengage with one another and marginal contact occurs as the screen is set.
Robinson (NYK) cleanly deflects Butler's (MIA) pass and is the last player to touch the before it goes out of bounds.
Adebayo (MIA) is late to establish himself in Grimes' (NYK) path and takes an additional step, which does not give Grimes room to avoid the contact during the screen.
Adebayo (MIA) rests his arm on Robinson's (NYK) body and immediately slides it off as Robinson secures the rebound.
Vincent (MIA) reaches in and initiates contact with Robinson's (NYK) arm, which affects his attempt to make the pass.
Adebayo (MIA) wraps Robinson (NYK) off ball, which affects his FOM and ability to move toward Vincent (MIA).
Robinson (MIA) reaches for the ball in an attempt to deflect the pass and marginal contact occurs with Adebayo's (MIA) arm before he cleanly secures it.
Randle (NYK) reaches for the ball on his contest and marginal follow-through contact occurs with Adebayo's (MIA) arm during the dunk attempt.
Grimes (NYK) slightly extends his arms toward Butler's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs during the screen.
Vincent (MIA) initiates contact with Brunson's (NYK) arm, which affects his SQBR during the driving shot attempt. The illegal contact causes Brunson to gather the ball and take three steps.
Randle (NYK) pulls down Adebayo's (MIA) arm, affecting his balance as he attempts to gather the rebound.
Vincent (MIA) initiates unnecessary contact with Brunson's (NYK) head.  After communicating with the Replay Center, the foul is deemed a flagrant foul, penalty 1.
Randle (NYK) brings his hands toward Adebayo (MIA) and marginal contact occurs as Randle (NYK) releases away after they mutually engage during the screen.
Grimes (NYK) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Randle (NYK) grasps and quickly releases Adebayo's (MIA) arm while Hart (NYK) secures the rebound. Any follow-through contact with Hart by Adebayo after he disengages is deemed marginal.
Butler (MIA) maintains a legal guarding position as he defends Brunson (NYK) at the end of the drive.
Vincent (MIA) is established in Randle's (NYK) path and absorbs the contact as Randle deflects away Brunson's (NYK) pass.
Adebayo (MIA) is in the paint for less than three seconds prior to the pass being deflected away.
Vincent (MIA) backpedals into Barrett (NYK) and incidental foot-to-foot contact occurs off-ball.
Brunson (NYK) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
Hart (NYK) establishes himself in Vincent's (MIA) path and absorbs the marginal contact during the screen.
Hart (NYK) commits a take foul on Strus (MIA).
Randle (NYK) extends his arm out and brushes Vincent's (MIA) arm.
